attributes.action: Recognise all that John Vaughan Does for the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He helps us all get through college day to day and is a general all round good guy

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
